text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://fhir.nmdp.org/ig/cibmtr-reporting/ValueSet/cibmtr-priority-variables-2021
  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    1754-1Albumin [Mass/volume] in Urine
    6942-7Albumin [Mass/volume] in Urine by Electrophoresis
    77158-4Albumin [Moles/volume] in Urine by Detection limit <= 3.0 mg/L
    1952-1Beta-2-Microglobulin [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    76484-5Beta-2-Microglobulin [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    35194-0Bilirubin.total [Mass or Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    1975-2Bilirubin.total [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    14631-6Bilirubin.total [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    77137-8Bilirubin.total [Moles/volume] in Serum, Plasma or Blood
    2532-0Lactate dehydrogenase [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    14804-9Lactate dehydrogenase [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Lactate to pyruvate reaction
    14805-6Lactate dehydrogenase [Enzymatic activity/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Pyruvate to lactate reaction
    35214-6Iron [Mass or Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    2498-4Iron [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    14798-3Iron [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    35215-3Iron binding capacity [Mass or Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    2500-7Iron binding capacity [Mass/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    14800-7Iron binding capacity [Moles/volume] in Serum or Plasma
    57028-3Iron [Mass/mass] in Liver
